messages.title: A BETTER PLAN. A BETTER FUTURE.
messages.content: Under the Tories A&E is facing the worst crisis since records began. Under the Tories working families are £1,600 worse off. Tory's extreme cuts would take spending back to the lowest levels since the 1930s, before the NHS even existed. Nigel Farage wants an American-style healthcare insurance system, not our NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Balance the books and cut the deficit every year while securing the future of the NHS. None of the manifesto commitments require additional borrowing.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: HIGHER LIVING STANDARDS FOR WORKING FAMILIES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Freeze energy bills until 2017 and give the regulator the power to cut bills this winter. Will ban exploitative zero-hours contracts, raise the minimum wage to £8, and provide 25 hours free childcare.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: AN NHS WITH THE TIME TO CARE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Build an NHS with the time to care by providing 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs; join up services from home to hospital, guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer tests within one week.
People who claim benefits as soon as they arrive will not be able to claim benefits for at least two years, and make it illegal for employers to undercut wages by exploiting workers.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A COUNTRY WHERE THE NEXT GENERATION CAN DO BETTER THAN THE LAST
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduce tuition fees to £6,000, guarantee an apprenticeship for every school leaver who gets the basic grades, and ensure smaller class sizes for 5, 6, & 7-year-olds.

issues.economy: Balance the books and cut the deficit every year while securing the future of the NHS.
issues.education: Reduce tuition fees to £6,000, guarantee an apprenticeship for every school leaver who gets the basic grades, and ensure smaller class sizes for 5, 6, & 7-year-olds.
issues.health: Build an NHS with the time to care by providing 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs; join up services from home to hospital, guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer tests within one week.
issues.immigration: People who claim benefits as soon as they arrive will not be able to claim benefits for at least two years, and make it illegal for employers to undercut wages by exploiting workers.

endorsements.endorsement: I back Labour's plan to tackle the cost of living crisis.
